pages.text: Ocean's Delight lets you dive into the depths of the ocean for new ingredients and recipes. $(br2)Harvest clams, fish, and seaweed to cook up a storm.
Start by collecting Raw Clams and crafting a Seaweed Steamer. $(br2)Prepare dishes like Steamed Clams, Kelp Wraps, and Grilled Fish for a maritime feast.
Add a splash of saltwater to your meals with Ocean's Delight and satisfy your oceanic cravings with every bite!
